name: Bray: Thin Blue Line
description:
Bray, a town on the east coast of Ireland. A town of corrupt cops, honest politicians and other morally questionable people. You play as a Sergeant in the Bray police, known to their friends and work mates as Skipper. Skipper has come back to work after a career break, thrown back into the madness that is the town of Bray. However, a new threat dawns over the town. A specialist team of SAS members led by Captain Carter wish to sabotage the town. It is up to Skipper to bring the people of the town together to stop this threat. 

Please bare in mind that this is still a work in progress.

Some of the asset sused are not mine but I haven't been arsed making credits for all the other creditors but don't worry guys, you guys are the real MVPs and you will be credited ;)

If the game is broken please let me know, because I'm not gonna lie I haven't tested it out yet.
